data.title: Well run McDonald's
data.text: Well-run McDonald's. Clean inside and out. Landscaping kept up to date. Bathrooms stocked and clean. Counter service was friendly and food was served promptly. Biscuit seemed a tad old. I realize they are basically microwaved but still seemed old. Coffee good.

data.title: Food was really bad
data.text: Stopped by several times on my way to work to grab biscuit. The biscuits were dried out and hard each time. I finally called and talked to the floor supervisor that said they were held over from the previous shift and she would talk to them. Went back one more time and again they were so hard I could not eat.
